feature_list: Define and document project scope
Gather detailed requirements for Piglet Management, User Management, Farm Staff Functionality, Farmer Functionality, Farm Owner Functionality, and Reporting & Analytics
Set up initial project architecture and workflows
Manage user accounts for farm staff and farmers
Implement role-based access control for staff, farmers, and farm owner (admin)
Develop user registration and login functionality for farmers
Manage piglet categories (different types of piglets)
Track piglet growth (weight, size)
Record feeding data (schedule, feed type, amount)
Monitor temperature (ambient and/or piglet body temperature)
Monitor environmental conditions (humidity, air quality)
Track health issues and common diseases (symptoms, diagnosis, treatment)
Update and maintain piglet information
Record import and export data
Track revenue statistics
Monitor overall piglet wellbeing
Browse available piglets with detailed information
Place orders for piglets
Communicate with the farm regarding feeding and vaccination procedures
Maintain up-to-date piglet and farm information
Post promotional announcements
Generate detailed monthly, quarterly, and annual reports
Generate revenue statistics reports
Generate growth and health performance reports
Perform comprehensive testing for all functionalities (backend, frontend, integration)
Fix identified bugs and update documentation
Deploy the system to production environments
Provide training sessions for farm staff and owner
